etymology.interpretation: Literally “sheep belly”; refers to sheep tripe, commonly cooked in stir-fries or hotpot.

examples.chinese: 我最爱吃羊肚火锅(我最愛吃羊肚火鍋)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ zuì ài chī yángdǔ huǒguō.

examples.chinese: 这道菜用新鲜羊肚清炖(這道菜用新鮮羊肚清燉)。
examples.pinyin: Zhè dào cài yòng xīnxiān yángdǔ qīngdùn.
examples.english: This dish uses fresh sheep tripe for a light stew.

examples.chinese: 市场里有卖处理好的羊肚(市場裡有賣處理好的羊肚)。
examples.pinyin: Shìchǎng lǐ yǒu mài chǔlǐ hǎo de yángdǔ.
examples.english: The market sells cleaned and prepared sheep tripe.
